data.text: @trudygonzales @LeaKThompson He may not be responsible but he sure isnt trying to do anything about it like setting the maximum price of gas to $2.00.  It was proposed during the Clinton Administration and was struck down on several occassions.  Bring it back and pass it

@trudygonzales What exactly is covid inflation? Do you understand foundational economic principles that causes inflation and high prices? HINT: printing money and pushing into the system via very low interest rates and checks sent to everyone and no supply due to shutting down keystone pipe.
@wxyzvb @thepoliticalcat @trudygonzales All the while taking in record corporate profits.
@wxyzvb @406Llama @trudygonzales When did they raise the minimum wage to offset any cost of living increase?

@trudygonzales Like... how is any President responsible for price gouging while the supply chain is broken, covid-19 in ALL countries.... They raise their prices then they raise the minimum wage to off set the price of living so, they raise the price again....
